00036     void MatrixHelper::CutRowFromTo(ScoreMatrix* D, const int &start,
00037         const int &end)
00038       {
00039 
00040         try
00041           {
00042             if ( (start> end )|| (end> D->size()))
00043             throw new MatrixOutofBoundsError(start,end,(int)D->size());
00044             D->erase(D->begin()+start, D->begin()+end);
00045           }
00046         catch (MatrixOutofBoundsError)
00047           {
00048 
00049           }
00050       }
00051 
00052     void MatrixHelper::CutColumnFromTo(ScoreMatrix* D, const int &start,
00053         const int &end)
00054       {
00055 
00056         for (int i=0; i<=D->size()-1; i++)
00057           {
00058             try
00059               {
00060                 if ( (start> end )|| (end> D->at(i).size()))
00061                 throw new MatrixOutofBoundsError(start,end,D->at(i).size());
00062                 D->at(i).erase(D->at(i).begin()+start, D->at(i).begin()+end);
00063               }
00064             catch (MatrixOutofBoundsError)
00065               {
00066 
00067               }
00068           }
00069       }

00071     ScoreMatrix MatrixHelper::InitializeScoreMatrixDistances(
00072         const bpp::Sequence* A, const bpp::Sequence* B,
00073         const ScoringModel* scoreM)
00074       {
00075         //Initialize Score Matrix
00076         ScoreMatrix D = InitScoreMatrixWith(A, B,
00077             numeric_limits<double>::infinity());
00078 
00079         D.at(0).at(0) = 0;
00080 
00081         D.at(0).at(1) = scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(B->getChar(0));
00082         +scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(0));
00083         //#ifdef _OPENMP            
00084         //#pragma omp parallel for
00085         //#endif 
00086         for (int i=2; i<D.at(0).size(); i++)
00087           D.at(0).at(i) = D.at(0).at(i-1) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(B->getChar(i-1));
00088 
00089         D.at(1).at(0) = scoreM->ScoreOfGapOpen(A->getChar(0))
00090             + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(0));
00091         //#ifdef _OPENMP            
00092         //#pragma omp parallel for
00093         //#endif         
00094         for (int i=2; i<D.size(); i++)
00095           D.at(i).at(0) = D.at(i-1).at(0) + scoreM->ScoreOfGapExtend(A->getChar(i-1));
00096 
00097         return D;
00098       }
00099 
00100     ScoreMatrix MatrixHelper::InitScoreMatrixWith(const bpp::Sequence* A,
00101         const bpp::Sequence* B, const double &init)
00102       {
00103         //Initialize Score Matrix
00104         ScoreMatrix P(A->size()+1, vector<double>(B->size() +1, init));
00105 
00106         return P;
00107       }
00108     ScoreMatrix3D MatrixHelper::InitScoreMatrix3DWith(
00109         const PseudoRotatedSequence* A, const bpp::Sequence* B,
00110         const int &delta, const double &init)
00111       {
00112         //A is doubled=pseudorotated so correct size is A/2
00113         int slaps = A->size();
00114         if (delta != 0)
00115           slaps /= delta;
00116 
00117         ScoreMatrix3D P(A->size()+1, vector< vector<double> >(B->size() +1,
00118             vector<double>(slaps, init)));
00119       }

00121     BoolMatrix MatrixHelper::CreateAdjacenceGraph(
00122         Alignment* pairWiseAlignments, int biggestSequenceSize)
00123       {
00124         //Construct Graph as Adjacence Matrix
00125         valarray <bool> tmp(false, biggestSequenceSize);
00126         BoolMatrix G(tmp, pairWiseAlignments->getNumberOfSequences()/2);
00127 
00128         cout << "constructing Graph"<< endl;
00129         for (int i=1; i<pairWiseAlignments->getNumberOfSequences(); i +=2)
00130           {
00131 #ifdef _OPENMP            
00132 #pragma omp parallel for shared(G)
00133 #endif 
00134             for (int j=0; j<pairWiseAlignments->getSequence(i)->size(); j++)
00135               {
00136                 //Check for match or not mismatch := !gap
00137                 if (pairWiseAlignments->getSequence(i)->getValue(j) != -1)
00138                   G[i/2][j] = true;
00139                 else
00140                   G[i/2][j] = false;
00141               }
00142           }
00143 
00144         return G;
00145       }

00147     int MatrixHelper::SearchBestInRow(const ScoreMatrix* M,
00148         const ScoringModel* scoreM, const int &start, const int &row)
00149       {
00150 
00151         int i = start;
00152         double minScore = M->at(row).at(start);
00153 
00154         for (int k=1; k<start; k++)
00155           {
00156             if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(M->at(row).at(k), minScore) != minScore)
00157               {
00158                 i = k;
00159                 minScore = M->at(row).at(k);
00160               }
00161           }
00162         return i;
00163 
00164       }
00165     int MatrixHelper::SearchBestInColumn(const ScoreMatrix* M,
00166         const ScoringModel* scoreM, const int &start, const int &column)
00167       {
00168 
00169         int j = start;
00170         double minScore = M->at(start).at(column);
00171 
00172         for (int k=1; k<start; k++)
00173           {
00174             if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(M->at(k).at(column), minScore) != minScore)
00175               {
00176                 j = k;
00177                 minScore = M->at(k).at(column);
00178               }
00179           }
00180         return j;
00181       }
00182 
00183     double MatrixHelper::SearchBestPositionFrom(const ScoreMatrix* M, int &i,
00184         int &j, const ScoringModel* scoreM)
00185       {
00186 
00187         double minScore = M->at(i).at(j);
00188         int tempI = SearchBestInRow(M, scoreM, j, i);
00189         int tempJ = SearchBestInColumn(M, scoreM, i, j);
00190 
00191         if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(minScore, M->at(tempI).at(j)) != minScore)
00192           if (scoreM->BestOfTwo(M->at(tempI).at(j) , M->at(i).at(tempJ)) == M->at(i).at(tempJ))
00193             {
00194               j = tempJ;
00195               minScore = M->at(i).at(tempJ);
00196             }
00197           else
00198             {
00199               i = tempI;
00200               minScore = M->at(tempI).at(j);
00201             }
00202 
00203         return minScore;
00204       }
